text.name: sys_description
text.text: The CP System II (Capcom Play System 2), more commonly known as CPS2 or CPS-2, is a cartridge video game system for a JAMMA compatible arcade machine intended for arcades, created by the Japanese company Capcom in order to Succeed the CP System (CPS-1). The CP System II was released in 1993 and has had a fairly long lifespan: 11 years of operation. The first game released for this medium is Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers, followed by many successful games.
